titles.title: Expressing the condolences of the House on the death of Representative Bill Emerson.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
Mr. Clay asked unanimous consent that the time for debate on the resolution be extended for not to exceed one hour. Agreed to without objection.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/25/1996--Introduced. Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Bill Emerson, a Representative from the State of Missouri.
